title: Nature's End
description: The year is 2025. Immense numbers of people swarm the globe. In countless, astonishing ways, technology has triumphedâ€”but at a staggering cost. Starvation is rampant. City dwellers gasp for breath under blackened skies. And tottering on the brink of environmental collapse, the world may be ending.... It is a future that could well be ours. In their second shocking and fascinating portrait of America's possible destiny, Whitley Strieber and James Kunetka have again written a breathless thriller, a book that gives us an important warning and ultimately a message of hope.
author: Whitley Strieber
